history.proof: intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. unfold disjs in H4. hauto lq: on use: expo_eq_exds_orb, expo_symm, expo_trans.

ctx: intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.

original: intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. unfold expo, exd, Iter_orb, disjs, not. intros [H6 H7] [i [H8 H9]]. unfold disjs in H4. destruct H4 as [H10 H11]. rewrite H8 in H10. apply H10; split. - exists i. reflexivity. - intros [H12|H12]; subst. + apply H5. auto. + apply H11. split; auto.
